subject: Big Brown (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horses
lead_paragraph: Big Brown was considered a stone-cold lock to become the 12th Triple Crown champion. But in the aftermath of his loss at the Belmont Stakes, the second-guessing was rampant.
snippet: Big Brown was considered a stone-cold lock to become the 12th Triple Crown champion. But in the aftermath of his loss at the Belmont Stakes, the second-guessing was rampant.
